solution_line_template: It takes him {time_to_learn_rules}*{proficiency_multiplier}=<<{time_to_learn_rules}*{proficiency_multiplier}={time_to_proficiency}>>{time_to_proficiency} hours to go from knowing how to play to proficient
So he spends {time_to_proficiency}+{time_to_learn_rules}=<<{time_to_proficiency}+{time_to_learn_rules}={combined_time_to_proficient}>>{combined_time_to_proficient} hours combined on those
So it takes him {master_multiplier}*{combined_time_to_proficient}=<<{master_multiplier}*{combined_time_to_proficient}={time_to_master}>>{time_to_master} hours to become a master from proficient
So the total time was {combined_time_to_proficient}+{time_to_master}=<<{combined_time_to_proficient}+{time_to_master}={total_time}>>{total_time} hours
